name: cloudfront-auth
description: An AWS Cloudfront Lambda@Edge function to authenticate requests using Google Apps, Microsoft, GitHub login, OKTA & Auth0

scripts.test: cd tests && yarn install && cd .. && node tests/tests.js
scripts.wrap: rm -f viewer-response.zip && cp .viewer-response.js _viewer-response.js && zip viewer-response.zip ./_viewer-response.js && rm -f _viewer-response.js
scripts.build: yarn install --production && cd build && yarn install --production && cd .. && node build/build.js && yarn wrap

author: Widen Enterprises
